resources.string: Please choose as many of your bad habits as you can identify from the following:
Sleeping irregular times or less than 6 hours/day
I walk regularly, prefer to climb stairs
I use the gym more than 3 times/week
Try to get outside and walk sometimes, you might like it!
Consider doing more physical activities than just a walk. Climb stairs, run, climb a mountain. Get comfortable shoes, it might help.
You are already doing a good job, physical activities are great. Try getting a bicycle, or consider having morning runs. They are refreshing.
Going to a gym is good, but don\'t forget to have real physical activities as well, walk and run outside, cycle or swim.
Gyms are great but fresh air is better. Try to train in nature if possible. Jog, run, swim, go skiing, you\'ll enjoy it more!
This application helps you find your current BMI (Body mass index), and your health condition. It is not a medical device or medical application and should not be used as such.
And a quiz to test your health and fitness knowledge
It\'s best to exercise in physical ways, walk more, climb stairs, run instead of always using your car, elevators, automated tools and a gym.

Doing all physical activities using your own strength is a way of life and helps you keep healthy even when you\'re not using a gym. You are exercising 7 days a week, in contrary to using a gym, where you might skip some days, or even weeks if you're on vacation or sick at home.
You want to take part to a marathon or some other extreme athletic activity. What should you do? (Check as many as you think)
Get a checkup and see if you are in a condition that allows you to take part on the athletic event
During your training you get dizzy, what would you do?
Stop for 5 minutes and continue later
Consult a doctor or your training instructor
Please fill in your details and hit the Calculate button
Please read the outcome and correct the invalid values
you are severely underweight, consult a doctor immediately.
you should eat more, you are underweight.
you weight exactly as much as you should. Good job!
you are slightly overweight. In other words you\'re a little bit fat. Exercise more or eat less.
you clearly need diet and exercise. Your BMI result yields Obese.
your health could be at risk. You should see a doctor.
Smoking is bad for your health, shortens your breath, makes you get tired more easily.
Drinking is bad for your kidneys, and athlets should have good kidneys.
Sleeping less than normal or irregularly could exhaust your body and heart.
You don\'t have any habits that could damage your heart or kidneys, good job!
Please complete the quiz before hitting that button!
